rooms.description: Serves as the welcoming entry with storage for coats and shoes.
Spacious dual-car garage integrated with the building layout; includes space for a utility area.
Compact yet functional kitchen setup designed to maximize efficiency in limited space.
Multi-functional area serving as living room with embedded home theatre system; flexible seating arrangement.
Private bedroom designed for comfort and relaxation, with ample natural light and Vastu-aligned positioning.
Modern bathroom with integrated plumbing system; designed to ensure privacy.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with Vastu principles.
Large east-facing window to bring in morning sunlight and positive energy.
